entries.title: Dealer Gravity backdrop controls
entries.description: Toggle Volume Profile, GEX, and structural lines from the Risk Graph header.

entries.title: Volume profile crash fix
entries.description: Fixed a crash when volume profile bins data was undefined.

entries.title: Positions no longer disappear
entries.description: Fixed Risk Graph positions vanishing due to broken optimistic updates.

entries.title: VP Editor restricted to admins
entries.description: Volume Profile Editor is now admin-only, with a link from the Admin panel.

entries.title: HTTP/2 and SSE reliability
entries.description: Enabled HTTP/2 for all connections and fixed Risk Graph SSE disconnect fallback.

entries.title: Routine drawer improvements
entries.description: Routine panel now loads faster with improved state management.

entries.title: Journal view enhancements
entries.description: Improved journal entry editor with better trade reflection context.

entries.title: Process bar stability
entries.description: Process bar state now persists correctly across page refreshes.
